content.question: The economic conditions described in the passage were most directly a result of which of the following?

choices.label: Harsh loan conditions imposed on Great Britain by the United States
The arms race resulting from the beginning of the Cold War
The lingering impact of the Great Depression
Britain’s commitment to full mobilization during the Second World War

content.answer: Britain’s commitment to full mobilization during the Second World War

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
